message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're lowballing me, let's meet in the middle!
I'm willing to compromise, but not that much. Let's try again!
You're getting desperate, I'm not giving up!
I'm getting desperate too, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. Take it or leave it!
You're running out of time, I'm not backing down!
I'm almost out of options, but I'll give you one more chance. Take it or leave it!
